message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $120 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $140 for the product. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my budget.
